Design and maintain peering policies, including traffic management, route filtering, redundancy planning, and failover strategies
Collaborate with diverse teams across Starlink to ensure seamless integration of peering implementation

Work with partner teams to automate and operationalize interconnection workflows, including route validation, telemetry, incident response, and lifecycle tracking.
